project.description: Runs a full tempest testsuite on a specified QA hardware.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional; scenario name which typically is an integer with a single letter

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_job_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional; name of the scenario jenkins job that is used to trigger this tempest full test

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_build_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Scenario build number associated with this scenario jenkins job

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hw_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mandatory; QA hardware to use to run the smoke tempest tests, e.g. 2, 3

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: testsetup
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Run tempest full within testsetup() in qa_crowbarsetup.sh script; you need to run it only once for a cloud build;
